Range

Range with config

someRange2config: any = {
  behaviour: 'drag',
  connect: true,
  margin: 1,
  limit: 5, // NOTE: overwritten by [limit]="10"
  range: {
    min: 0,
    max: 20
  },
  pips: {
    mode: 'steps',
    density: 5
  }
};
<div nouislider [config]="someRange2config" [limit]="10" [(ngModel)]="someRange2"></div>
someRange2: {{ someRange2 | json }}
